act.title: Dialogue Reconstruction
act.intro: Put the sentences below in the correct order. (They are jumbled randomly and appear in a different order everytime you attemp the activity)

item.pinyin: Nín hǎo, qǐngwèn nín jǐ wèi?

item.hanzi: 你好，我还有两个朋友要来。
item.pinyin: Nǐhǎo, wǒ háiyǒu liǎng gè péngyou yào lái.

item.hanzi: 我们有上好的龙井，您不妨尝一尝
item.pinyin: Wǒmen yǒu shànghǎo de lóngjǐng, nín bùfáng chángyicháng.

item.hanzi: 好，那就来一壶龙井茶吧，再来一碟小点心。
item.pinyin: Hǎo, nà jiù lái yī hú lóngjǐngchá ba, zài lái yī dié xiǎo diǎnxīn.
